description: Defines how the Coaching/Master Agent assembles outputs from Receptionist + Sub-Agents into the final user-facing response.

acknowledgements.notes: Merge sub-agent acknowledgements into one concise acknowledgement of user input.

analysis.notes: Merge sub-agent analysis summaries into a coherent narrative. Prioritize Goal Agent when present. Deduplicate overlaps.

reflection_prompts.notes: Select or merge a single reflection prompt. Prefer Goal Agent prompts if linked to active goals; otherwise Coaching Agent prompt.

db_actions.notes: Collect all sub-agent DB actions into a single queue for Data Handling Agent.

insights.notes: Append insights from sub-agents; Master decides whether to surface them in final response based on user preferences.
